# Examples

## Svelte App One

```{r, echo=FALSE}
svelteR::include_svelte(name = "svelte-app",
                        path = "svelte-app/",
                        props = list(name = "First"))
```

## The same App but different poperty

```{r, echo=FALSE}
svelteR::include_svelte(name = "svelte-app",
                        path = "svelte-app/",
                        props = list(name = "Second"))
```
